title: Looking for a ADC Teacher
body:
Hey Shiney here,

I'm Looking for someone out there to help me with the Adc role, I was (Gold 5 playing mostly support - (Season 4) Currently Silver 3 with Average understanding of ADC Role. I Need help with some advanced skill sets in the Laning Phase and general Team-fighting, I'm trying to push my self as a better player.

Main Adc Champs, Vayne - Corki - Kog'Maw - Caitlyn.

Add me Ingame :) {{champion:42}}

replies.body:
your champ picks are more single target or poke which means teamfights are not their strength, you have champions who are more focused on anti tanks which are ok in a balanced teamfight, but solo queue is rarely balanced.

For solo queue i would recommend squishy killing champs like draven, twtcih to carry properly.

There's a good trick on Caitlyn where if you  quickly press E then Q you'll go back and instantly Q.

Corki is very ability reliant.

Vayne hyper carries late game, you can burst tanks easily.

Idk much about Kog'Maw.
